# Sojourn

`Sojourn` is a package for applying Sojourn methods to ActiGraph accelerometer data. See [Lyden et al. (2014)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/23860415) and [Hibbing et al. (2018)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/29135657).
